titles.title: Tonari no Kimi ga Ichiban Kawaii
The One Sitting Next To Me
隣の君が一番かわいい
The You Next to Me Is the Cutest One of All

title: Tonari no Kimi ga Ichiban Kawaii
title_english: The You Next to Me Is the Cutest One of All
title_japanese: 隣の君が一番かわいい
title_synonyms: The One Sitting Next To Me
synopsis:
Akari Kohinata finds the classmate who sits next to her, Yuu Hoshikawa, cuter than any other girl she has ever met. However, Yuu has one small problem with this: he is actually a boy and in love with Akari, but he believes that his feminine features make her oblivious to his feelings. In order to resolve his predicament, Yuu makes an effort to flaunt his masculine side to Akari, but that only makes him cuter!

While Akari has an overwhelming admiration for her classmate's charm, Yuu firmly believes that Akari is much cuter than him. As they spend more time together, the pair only grow more enamoured with each other. After all, each finds the person sitting next to them to be the cutest one of all.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: Tonari no Kimi ga Ichiban Kawaii is a web manga released on the author's Twitter and pixiv accounts from February 22, 2020 to January 9, 2022, and published in print by Kadokawa from June 9, 2021 to February 16, 2022.
